comments.author: Esteban Franqueiro
comments.body:
It seems that the last commit deleted some changes from previous commits. For example, SessionImpl.createDataStoreGarbageCollector(), but I think there are others.
Regards.

comments.author: Stefan Guggisberg
comments.body:
oops, you're right. thanks, esteban!

fixed in svn r605880.

description: according to paragraph "3.3.4" of the of the JSR 283 specification (Public Review Draft), a property and a node can have the same name.
summary: A Property and a Node Can Have the Same Name
